attributes.action: take the UK out of the EU, restoring full control of sovereign rights to the British elected government in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To restore law making to the UK that is not subservient to Brussels, to only co-operate with the EU on matters of absolute necessity, to work for the economic good of the UK primarily, putting the EU secondary in all matters.

rejection.details: There is already a petition dealing with this issue.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
